sentences.en: A team - player, strong interpersonal communication skills, self - motivated , initiative, work conscientiously and responsibly.
sentences.cn: 富团队精神, 具备良好的沟通协调能力, 工作积极主动, 认真负责.

sentences.en: At the beginning of the new term , all the students conscientiously obeyed the rules of the school.
sentences.cn: 所有的学生,在上学初期, 都很循规蹈矩.

sentences.en: But has chosen this topic, going to understand conscientiously.
sentences.cn: 不过选择了这个题目, 就要认真的去了解.

sentences.en: I carried out my duties conscientiously.
sentences.cn: 我一丝不苟地履行我的职责。

sentences.en: If we work conscientiously, we won't make many mistakes.
sentences.cn: 工作认真负责, 就会少出差错.

sentences.en: If you work conscientiously you'll only die a pauper.
sentences.cn: 你按部就班地干,做到老也是穷死.

sentences.en: More steps should be taken conscientiously to solve them.
sentences.cn: 今后要继续采取措施,认真加以解决.

sentences.en: Officers and men perform their assigned duties conscientiously.
She discharged all the responsibilities of a minister conscientiously.
sentences.cn: 她自觉地履行部长的一切职责.

sentences.en: Some people do — even if among those who go on attending classes conscientiously!
sentences.cn: 其中还不乏不曾缺课的认真学生!

sentences.en: There's a good deal in that, but I acted conscientiously.
sentences.cn: 那也很有道理, 但我是凭良心做事.

sentences.en: To conscientiously strengthen the internal management of units operating cemeteries.
sentences.cn: (三)要切实加强公墓单位的内部管理.

sentences.en: We always follow the conscientiously, high - efficient , high quality style of work.
sentences.cn: 我们一向奉行认真 、 效 、 质的工作作风.

sentences.en: We must esteem them as teachers, learning from them respectfully and conscientiously.
sentences.cn: 拜他们做老师, 恭恭敬敬地学,老老实实地学.

sentences.en: We must work conscientiously to unite all those who can be united.
sentences.cn: 我们要认真工作来团结一切可以团结的人.

words.tran_cn: 认真的；尽责的；本着良心的；小心谨慎的

trans.tran_cn: 凭良心地，认真地，负责尽职地，老老实实
